subject: Order Status Order #SSN3091
description_text:
Hello, I am just asking for the current status of the order. I am concerned that no updates have been made since Oct 28th? 
Here is my order number: 
Order #SSN3091

Any help you can provide on this will be appreciated.
Thank you.
Yahoo Mail: Search, organise, conquer

conversations.body_text: Hi Umar afham Mokhtar,    This is the email address you provided. We have sent the order confirmation and shipping notification to this address. Would you like to change it?  Here is your shipping tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045993559442
